name: Gary's Lemonade Stand
description:
Play as Gary and sell lemonade in this new take on a classic.

The game ends on the 15th day (or earlier).

Made in 2 weeks for StraightUpGameJam2.

Known Bugs:

- Some of the top emails may display out of order

- Loading autosaves can be buggy, but generally works

Music/SFX Credits

Beeps and Boops: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Pitcher pour: hanstimm, https://freesound.org/people/hanstimm/sounds/256861

Mouse click: pbimal, https://freesound.org/people/pbimal/sounds/534103/

Computer white noise: matucha, https://freesound.org/people/matucha/sounds/160465/

The Biggest Smile: David Fesliyan, https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/the-biggest-smile/39...
